sentences.en: I always think that vermilion and black are classic colors of lacquer.

sentences.en: Methods Applied elongation of the oral fissure combined with vermilion mucosal flap translated in 59 cases.
sentences.cn: 方法:对59例小口畸形病例,采用口角开大术及红唇粘膜瓣转移再造新口角.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the reconstruction of the secondary vermilion tubercle deformity of bilateral cleft lip.
sentences.cn: 目的纠正先天性双侧唇裂术后遗留的唇珠缺损或唇珠不显畸形.

sentences.en: The entrance was made to be the symbolic existence of expectation for the previous state with a fascination decorated with a five-colored curtain and a profound vermilion-lacquered signboard.
sentences.cn: 入口与之前的充满魅力的装饰形成符号意义上存在的延续，用了一个五色的门帘和一个意味深长的朱红色的布告。

sentences.en: The furniture on it is glossy vermilion.

sentences.en: The vermilion gates and windows better highlight the wealth and rank of her family.
